catalog_info.title: Methods of Analysis
catalog_info.notes: Mathematics 115 is especially for students interested in physics.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Mathematics 23a,b or 25a,b or 55a,b or 112; or an equivalent background in mathematics.
catalog_info.description: Complex functions; Fourier analysis; Hilbert spaces and operators; Laplace's equations; Bessel and Legendre functions; symmetries; Sturm-Liouville theory.
